description: This extended-range zoom offers true telephoto capability ideal for a variety of applications including sports and wildlife shooting. The lens also features the capability to provide beautifully blurred background to high light the main subject in portraiture, or "compression effects" that make the most of the telephoto lens.Model:AF276C-700Lens Construction: (Groups/Elements) 9-13Angle of View  33-8 degreesType of Zooming:  RotationDiaphragm Blade Number: 9Minimum Aperture:  F/22Minimum Focus:  59.0in. (1.5m)Macro Mag. Ratio:  1:3.7Filter Diameter:  62Weight: 15.3oz. (435gm)Mount: Canon
title: Tamron AF 75-300mm f/4.0-5.6 LD for Canon Digital SLR Cameras (Model 672DE/AF276C-700)
